amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for EDA by $38 million and to reduce the funding for the Bureau of Census, Periodic Censuses and Programs Account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funds for the Economic Development Assistance Programs Account by $38 million and reduce the funds for the Bureau of Census, Periodic Censuses and Programs Account by $38 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Michaud amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 218 (Roll no. 205).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Michaud.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Michaud amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 218 (Roll no. 205).
